mapper.select: SELECT p.board_no, s.skill_no sskill_no, s.field_no, s.name sname FROM pf_portfolio p LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_portfolio_skill ps ON p.board_no = ps.board_no LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_member_skill ms ON ps.member_skill_no = ms.member_skill_no LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_general_member m ON m.general_member_no = ms.general_member_no LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_skill s ON s.skill_no = ms.skill_no WHERE p.board_no = ${number}
